bibdata.title: AIEE Proposed Test Procedure for Thermal Evaluation of Ventilated Dry-Type Power and Distribution Transformers
AIEE Proposed Test Procedure for Thermal Evaluation of Ventilated Dry-Type Power and Distribution Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The object of this Test Procedure is to establish a uniform method for determining operating temperature limits for ventilated dry-type power and distribution transformers, to give a reasonable life expectancy under normal operating conditions.

The object of this Test Procedure is to establish a uniform method for determining operating temperature limits for ventilated dry-type power and distribution transformers, to give a reasonable life expectancy under normal operating conditions.
